scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:style
scripts.lint:prod: npm run lint:js-prod && npm run lint:style
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -r "wait-on tcp:3000 && npm run start-server-dev " "npm run start-frontend-dev"
scripts.test: npm run test-backend && npm run test-e2e
scripts.build-docker-base: docker buildx build -f docker/debian-base.dockerfile --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7 -t louislam/uptime-kuma:base2 --target base2 --push
scripts.build-docker-base-slim: docker buildx build -f docker/debian-base.dockerfile --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7 -t louislam/uptime-kuma:base2-slim --target base2-slim --push
scripts.build-docker-builder-go: docker buildx build -f docker/builder-go.dockerfile --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7 -t louislam/uptime-kuma:builder-go --push
scripts.build-docker-nightly-local: npm run build && docker build -f docker/dockerfile -t louislam/uptime-kuma:nightly2 --target nightly .
scripts.build-docker-pr-test: docker buildx build -f docker/dockerfile --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t louislam/uptime-kuma:pr-test2 --target pr-test2 --push
scripts.setup: git checkout 1.23.16 && npm ci --omit dev && npm run download-dist
scripts.update-language-files: cd extra/update-language-files && node index.js && cross-env-shell eslint ../../src/languages/$npm_config_language.js --fix
scripts.build-dist-and-restart: npm run build && npm run start-server-dev
scripts.start-pr-test: node extra/checkout-pr.mjs && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.build-healthcheck-armv7: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm GOARM=7 go build -x -o ./extra/healthcheck-armv7 ./extra/healthcheck.go
